name: Digital Commerce Activation Manager
description:
We are looking for Digital Commerce activation manager who will be responsible for creating, recommending and co-executing best-in-class on- and off- platforms activations to drive our brands sales across our key partners: ePharmacies, Marketplaces, eGroceries, Omni pharmacies and Omni hypermarkets.

Main Tasks:

  • Lead sales activations plan creation & execution for key e-Partners together with eCom KAMs: Visibility activations, Discounts and various promo mechanics, Online merchandizing, Direct marketing, Search optimization, Special project with key partners, etc.
  • Provide consistency across eCommerce activations strategy with other digital activities and offline promo plans.
  • Participate in negotiations with platforms, retailers and services to guarantee excellent digital commerce sales logic and top conditions for each activation.
  • Support sales team plans development to include eCommerce in every JBP.
  • Leverage analytics tools to continuously test & learn, optimize and scale best activations.
  • Brainstorm, create and implement off-platform digital commerce activities & eCom media in conjunction with marketing team and media agency to strengthen on-platform performance: drive conversional traffic to e-Retailers.
  • Evaluate and ensure the highest efficiency for GSK activations. Activations analysis using performance metrics: ROI, CR, CPO, OR, Impressions, CPM, CPC, CPA and others. Present results.
  • Partner with global team, monitor GSK worldwide experience and external market best practices for latest updates and benchmarks on eActivations drive eCommerce growth.
  • Act as the key initiator and contributor to cross functional collaboration and best practice sharing around digital commerce activations.

Requirements:

  • Higher education. Preferably Digital, eCommerce, Management or Marketing
  • 1-3 years of work experience in e-Commerce activations field with e-Retailers required
  • Proven track record of eActivations plans creation & execution on large e-Retailers required: FMCG or Pharma categories preferred
  • Strong analytical skills with understanding of key digital metrics and experience applying data to make decisions required
  • Strong negotiator looking for a win-win opportunity with our partners
  • Areas of expertise should include: eRetailers promo plan creation, on-platform eActivations, Marketplace Engine Optimization, Paid Search, E-mailing & CRM marketing
  • Highly developed organization skills, attention to detail and able to prioritize effectively
  • Excellent communications skills, verbal, written
  • Presentation skills
  • Proficient PC user: Excel, Powerpoint, Photoshop or another graphic editor recommended
  • English: Upper-Intermediate required

What we can offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Medical insurance, life insurance
  • Meal allowance
  • Mobile compensation
  • Internal and external educational courses and trainings
